card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Kiln Fiend
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Izzet Guildmage
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) {2}{U}: Copy target instant spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy. {2}{R}: Copy target sorcery spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Gelectrode
card.property: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

card.name: Wee Dragonauts
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Steamcore Weird
card.property: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Shrewd Hatchling
card.property: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {U/R}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

card.name: Ogre Savant
card.property: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast it, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Galvanoth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's an instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Izzet Chronarch
card.property: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Djinn Illuminatus
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Force Spike
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Magma Spray
card.property: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Isochron Scepter
card.property: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Call to Heel
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Train of Thought
card.property: Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Draw a card.

card.name: Pyromatics
card.property: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Izzet Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Reminisce
card.property: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Thunderheads
card.property: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vacuumelt
card.property: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dissipate
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."

card.name: Prophetic Bolt
card.property: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Overwhelming Intellect
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

card.name: Street Spasm
card.property: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control. Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Invoke the Firemind
card.property: Choose one — • Draw X cards. • Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. // Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Fire
alternate.property: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

alternate.name: Ice
alternate.property: Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

card.name: Izzet Boilerworks
card.property: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Lonely Sandbar
card.property: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Nivix, Aerie of the Firemind
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{U}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may cast it if it's an instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord
card.property: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Golgari Thug
card.property: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Boneyard Wurm
card.property: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Korozda Guildmage
Putrid Leech
card.property: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Eternal Witness
card.property: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dreg Mangler
card.property: Haste Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shambling Shell
card.property: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Brain Weevil
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Sacrifice Brain Weevil: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Greater Mossdog
card.property: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Golgari Grave-Troll
card.property: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, you may mill six cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Stingerfling Spider
card.property: Reach When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Sadistic Hypnotist
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Golgari Rotwurm
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

card.name: Gleancrawler
card.property: ({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Doomgape
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Ghoul's Feast
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Yoke of the Damned
card.property: Enchant creature When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.

card.name: Life from the Loam
card.property: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Golgari Germination
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Putrefy
card.property: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Feast or Famine
card.property: Choose one — • Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. • Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Nightmare Void
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Vigor Mortis
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Grim Flowering
card.property: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Twilight's Call
card.property: You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Life // Death

alternate.name: Death
